member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceivePaypalWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving Paypal WebHooks using the Paypal .NET SDK, see https://www.nuget.org/packages/PayPal. Configure the Paypal WebHook settings using the web.config file as described in https://github.com/paypal/PayPal-NET-SDK/wiki/Webhook-Event-Validation. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/paypal'. For details about Paypal WebHooks, see https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/integration/direct/rest-webhooks-overview/.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.Receiver_BadBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The HTTP request body did not contain a required '{0}' property..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.Receiver_InitFailure
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Initialization of the Paypal SDK failed: '{0}'. Please ensure that the Web.config file contains the required Paypal configuration section..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.Receiver_InvalidWebHook
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The received WebHook is not valid..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.PaypalReceiverResources.Receiver_ValidationFailure
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WebHook validation failed: {0}.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.PaypalWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Paypal using the Paypal .NET SDK, see https://www.nuget.org/packages/PayPal. Configure the Paypal WebHook settings using the web.config file as described in https://github.com/paypal/PayPal-NET-SDK/wiki/Webhook-Event-Validation. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/paypal'. For details about Paypal WebHooks, see https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/integration/direct/rest-webhooks-overview/.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This constructor is intended for testing purposes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.PaypalWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.
